title: Visualization Techniques
description: Discuss methods for visualizing learned features and model activations (e.g., t-SNE, heatmaps).

examples.description: Visualizes how input signals influence model predictions, offering insights into EEG feature importance.
examples.note: Added for illustrating how visualizations can help understand the influence of input signals on model predictions in EEG-based driver drowsiness recognition.

examples.description: Includes visualizations of brain topography to show fatigue's impact on EEG connectivity.
examples.note: Added for demonstrating the use of brain topography visualizations to understand the impact of fatigue on EEG connectivity.

examples.description: Uses visualizations to show brain network topology changes associated with driver drowsiness.
examples.note: Added for using visualizations to illustrate changes in brain network topology associated with driver drowsiness.

trend: Making the model's internal representations and decision boundaries more understandable.
